Describe your issue: I need to contact someone in regards to a subscription being started without my authorization. I had canceled my previous subscription in June of 2020 before I was billed. I was then billed December 2020 and January 2020 for a subscription I never subscribed to. 
I would like to be refunded for the months of December 2020 and January 2021. As well as the subscription to be removed from my account.

What type of problem ?: Other Describe your problem: I have a question about my Canva Pro subscription and the 4 people who are added to my subscription for free for the whole year. Can you contact me? Thank you in advance! <NAME> LE ROY

I had set up my account initially via your webpage and not app.  Help!!!

What problem are you having?: Hello, I sent you a message yesterday but you did not answer my question correctly. I subscribed to a pro subscription and I created a CV on the site on Friday January 8th. But I cannot have access to my CV or cancel my subscription because I am not registered on the site! I have given you my bank details and I cannot cancel my subscription. So I had to log in via google to send you this message. Can you give me a number to call to fix the problem? Thank you in advance.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Someone used my PayPal account to purchase a subscription in the amount of $119.40. I have no subscription with your company and this purchase was unauthorized. I have disputed this charge with PayPal.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I do not want a subscription and I keep getting billed. Please take me off the billing cycle.

Describe your issue: I am being billed for a subscription and orders that I have not generated or authorized.

Describe your issue: I have Canva Pro Subscription, but my account does not reflect such subscription.

What kind of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: Dear Canva team, I have an important question regarding the image licenses in the Enterprise and Pro subscription. If we receive a reminder from a private person, how can we prove that we have the license for certain images with the help of the Canva subscription. We can only prove that we have a subscription, but we have no proof for the individual picture. This point is very important to us, as we have already received reminders here in the past. Thanks for an answer. Kind regards <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Suddenly my brand templates and upgrades are gone and Canva keeps prompting me to upgrade.  I have an active annual subscription for Canva Pro that renews Jan 29, 2022.  I have a screenshot of my subscriptions page on my iPhone, but Usersnap is ridiculous and will only snapshot the current window (which makes no sense).
Describe the issue: I cant renew my subscription i used 2 type of cards that is normally available. :(

What kind of problem?: Sharing

Describe your issue: How do I add people onto this account with the subscription I have?
